REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f1295 reute b f BC-KAINES-CONFIRMS-WHITE 04-01 0062

TEXT.TITLE: KAINES CONFIRMS WHITE SUGAR SALES TO INDIA
TEXT.BODY: London-based sugar operator Kaines Ltd confirmed it sold two cargoes of white sugar to India out of an estimated overall sales total of four or five cargoes in which other brokers participated. The sugar, for April/May and April/June shipment, was sold at between 214 and 218 dlrs a tonne cif, it said. Reuter
